name: Gramercy Tech
description:
Founded in 2003, Gramercy Tech is a New York and LA based digital laboratory specializing in concept creation, design, software development, production, and execution for events. Combining our versatile event production experience with imaginative approaches, Gramercy Tech produces remarkable large-scale events that reimagine interactive experiences through the use of avant-garde technology â€“ from virtual reality to motion control to reactive digital signage.
Our team of creators and engineers work with clients to beautifully execute their ideas.
Over the years Gramercy Tech has created exceptional apps and innovative digital solutions for a number of high-profile clients, including Pensa, Citigroup, Goldman Sachs, Bentley, and Blizzard Entertainment. Many of our projects stem from strong and longstanding relationships and our ability to understand the unique needs of our clients.
